Title: Urgent Action: Churn Risk Detected
Description: Customer has placed no orders in 45 days despite a previously consistent monthly pattern. Recommend follow-up call to investigate.

Title: Contract At Risk
Description: AI flagged a major slowdown in Q2 compared to Q1. The account manager should check if procurement priorities have shifted.

Title: Declining Engagement Warning
Description: Engagement frequency and order size have dropped substantially. Consider scheduling a review meeting to understand their status.

Title: Customer Relationship At Risk
Description: Last 3 months show negative purchase trends. Recommend re-engagement with tailored offer or loyalty incentive.

Title: Warning: Order Frequency Falling Rapidly
Description: Customer has gone from weekly to monthly purchases. Might be testing a competitor — immediate check-in advised.

Title: Dormant But High-Value Account
Description: No purchases since January, yet customer spent €180,000 last year. AI suggests targeted reactivation via email or call.

Title: Missed Revenue Opportunity
Description: Customer hasn’t purchased in 90+ days despite prior high-volume history. Re-engagement offer could recover significant revenue.

Title: Customer Slippage Alert
Description: Customer is gradually slipping. Consider automated check-in or survey to understand cause of inactivity.

Title: Past Top Buyer Gone Quiet
Description: Large volume orders in Q3 last year. No activity since February. AI suggests sending a personalized promotion.

Title: Follow-Up Needed: Performance Drop
Description: Revenue from this customer has fallen 68% over 6 months. Recommend manager outreach to identify friction.

Title: Upsell: Matching Product Opportunity
Description: Customer frequently orders Product X. 80% of similar buyers added Product Y within 60 days. Suggest bundled promotion.

Title: Cross-Sell Potential Identified
Description: Buying behavior aligns with other customers who also purchased Service Z. Recommend trial offer or bundle.

Title: Recurring Purchase Pattern Detected
Description: Orders every 3 weeks show a consistent demand trend. Suggest auto-replenishment proposal or volume deal.

Title: AI Suggests Repeat Order Nudge
Description: Customer has not reordered in expected time window. Send automated reminder with reorder link or incentive.

Title: Growth Insight: Segment Match Found
Description: This customer’s behavior matches high-growth clients in another segment. Consider suggesting new product line or consultation.

Title: Churn Risk: Response Required
Description: Significant decline in purchase activity suggests potential churn. Immediate outreach may recover the account.

Title: High-Value Client Going Silent
Description: Top-20 client has gone quiet for two months. Recommend senior sales call to realign expectations.

Title: Sales Trend Warning Triggered
Description: Customer activity sharply down compared to historical trend. Opportunity to intervene before loss.

Title: Contract Renewal Risk
Description: No activity in 6 weeks and annual renewal is approaching. Review relationship and reengagement plan.

Title: Alert: Diminished Engagement
Description: Purchase frequency and order size have dropped 70%. Consider initiating feedback or survey touchpoint.

Title: Revive Dormant Client
Description: No orders since Q1. Client previously generated €75K annually. Suggest a tailored reactivation deal.

Title: Missed Q2 Revenue Opportunity
Description: Customer failed to place any Q2 orders despite strong Q1 activity. Review last communication and follow up.

Title: Buyer Engagement Drop-Off
Description: Inactive since January. Historical volume justifies attempt to re-engage via loyalty or volume-based promo.

Title: Old Customer, New Potential?
Description: Last invoice was 8 months ago. Still within top 10% of historical spenders. Suggest reactivation call.

Title: Silent But Strategic Account
Description: Account spent over €100K in 2023, now inactive. Recommend personal outreach to assess situation.

Title: Upsell Triggered By Behavior Match
Description: This customer’s order pattern matches others who also purchased our upgraded cooling module. Recommend upsell offer.

Title: Cross-Sell Insight Available
Description: Purchases in Category A typically indicate interest in complementary products. Suggest bundling options.

Title: Likely Repeat Order Delay
Description: Customer usually reorders every 6 weeks — current gap is 9 weeks. Reminder email could trigger purchase.

Title: AI Suggests New Product Match
Description: Customer’s segment and behavior align with high adopters of Product Z. Propose an introductory trial.

Title: Revenue Expansion Opportunity
Description: Recent buying behavior shows readiness for add-on package. Propose bundle during next conversation.

Title: Customer Inactivity Alert
Description: Purchases have decreased by over 60% in the past quarter. Customer may be disengaging — follow-up needed.

Title: Engagement Decline Detected
Description: Steady reduction in purchase frequency from this account. AI flags it as at risk — consider personal outreach.

Title: Key Client Showing Downtrend
Description: Monthly spend has dropped sharply. Possible churn risk — reach out before competitor steps in.

Title: Flagged for Relationship Review
Description: This client had regular orders and suddenly stopped. Might signal dissatisfaction or internal change.

Title: Urgent Retention Opportunity
Description: No orders for 7 weeks, abnormal for this customer. Suggest retention call or discount offer.

Title: Reconnect With Dormant Buyer
Description: Customer inactive for 5 months, but high historical value. Offer a loyalty-based incentive to re-engage.

Title: Potential Recovery Lead
Description: AI spotted value loss from this inactive customer. Recommend sending a targeted promotional email.

Title: Lapsed Buyer - New Campaign Target
Description: Last invoice 6+ months ago. Suggest retargeting in next email campaign with bundled pricing.

Title: Top-25 Client No Longer Active
Description: Inactivity since early this year. Past purchase history justifies personal follow-up.

Title: Customer Recovery Insight
Description: Customer drifted away despite frequent orders in 2023. Offer time-limited discount to win them back.

Title: Cross-Sell Based on Recent Orders
Description: Recent purchases suggest potential need for our calibration add-on product. Recommend test bundle.

Title: Pattern Detected: New Product Fit
Description: Invoice trends match others who upgraded to our premium line. Offer tailored upsell option.

Title: Auto-Reorder Opportunity Identified
Description: Customer has reordered every 30 days like clockwork. Offer auto-delivery subscription.

Title: Suggest Product Upgrade
Description: Purchase of base model aligns with upgrade patterns. Recommend enhanced version via email.

Title: AI Flags Complementary Product Match
Description: Recent orders indicate interest in a related product line. Present upsell opportunity during next interaction.
